nodes.text: Xuvva Hunter's Sport Rifle was a make of sporting blaster rifle available during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the war, the Imperial Intelligence agent codenamed Cipher Nine acquired one while in the palace of the Hutt crime lord Suudaa Nem'ro on the planet Nal Hutta. Selling for 25, parts of the black-colored blaster rifle could be modified, including its color crystal. The weapons were designed for use hunting Xuvva, a species of winged predators native to Nal Hutta.

The Xuvva Hunter's Sport Rifle first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. The rifle is rewarded to players of the Imperial Agent class, the only class who can use it, after they complete the class mission "Soiree" on Hutta. It is not clear where the player acquires the rifle during the mission.
